item.text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

item.name: Mind Stone
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Not by age but by capacity is wisdom gained." —Titus Maccius Plautus, Trinummus

item.name: Ornithopter
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work." —Urza, in his apprenticeship

item.name: Phyrexian Vault
item.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew." —Kaervek

item.name: Pithing Needle
item.text: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, name a card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

item.name: Platinum Angel
item.text: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
item.flavorText: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.

item.name: Razormane Masticore
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card. At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

item.name: Rod of Ruin
item.text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

item.name: Sculpting Steel
item.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.

item.name: Spellbook
item.text: You have no maximum hand size.
item.flavorText: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again." —Karn, silver golem

item.name: Steel Golem
item.text: You can't cast creature spells.
item.flavorText: "Once you create perfection, what else is there to make?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

item.name: Whispersilk Cloak
item.text: Equipped creature is unblockable. Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: Such cloaks are in high demand both by assassins and by those who fear them.

item.name: Wurm's Tooth
item.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.

item.name: Adarkar Wastes
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Battlefield Forge
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Brushland
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Caves of Koilos
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Faerie Conclave
item.text: Faerie Conclave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue Faerie creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.name: Forbidding Watchtower
item.text: Forbidding Watchtower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {1}{W}: Forbidding Watchtower becomes a 1/5 white Soldier creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

item.name: Ghitu Encampment
item.text: Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

item.name: Karplusan Forest
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Llanowar Wastes
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Quicksand
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

item.name: Shivan Reef
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Spawning Pool
item.text: Spawning Pool enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {1}{B}: Spawning Pool becomes a 1/1 black Skeleton creature with "{B}: Regenerate this creature" until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it regenerates, the next time it would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

item.name: Sulfurous Springs
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Terramorphic Expanse
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

item.name: Treetop Village
item.text: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Underground River
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Yavimaya Coast
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.text: W

item.text: W

item.text: U
